title: (x) Katana faux oriental font - Karate {Manlio}
content:
Hi all, I'm looking for this font.  
Does anyone know what font is it, an where can I find it, freeware or not?

Many thanks,  
Lorenzo

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [logo-katana.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20130506031725/http:/typophile.com/files/logo-katana.gif) | 5.39 KB |
author: elleerre

comments.content: Can't match it, but check out this list of [faux Asian fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20130506031725/http:/www.typophile.com/node/13337).
